private_information: I am agent_1 and I am authorized to move disks: A B C D
I can only move disks A, B, C, D and must follow Tower of Hanoi rules
agent_1.goal: Contribute to reconfiguring the tower to the target arrangement: left peg top-to-bottom E F G H I J, middle peg D, right peg A B C

private_information: I am agent_2 and I am authorized to move disks: E F G
I can only move disks E, F, G and must follow Tower of Hanoi rules
agent_2.goal: Contribute to reconfiguring the tower to the target arrangement: left peg top-to-bottom E F G H I J, middle peg D, right peg A B C

private_information: I am agent_3 and I am authorized to move disks: H I J
I can only move disks H, I, J and must follow Tower of Hanoi rules
agent_3.goal: Contribute to reconfiguring the tower to the target arrangement: left peg top-to-bottom E F G H I J, middle peg D, right peg A B C

private_information: I coordinate agents and integrate their move sequences into a single plan
I will produce a PDDL domain and problem compatible with the FastDownwards planner
orchestrator.goal: Integrate agents' move lists and produce a PDDL domain and problem that implements the cooperative plan and is ready for FastDownwards

init.initial_configuration: left peg top-to-bottom A B C D E F G H I J; middle peg empty; right peg empty

public_information: There are three pegs: left, middle, right
There are 10 disks labeled A (smallest) through J (largest)
Initial configuration: left peg top-to-bottom A B C D E F G H I J, middle peg empty, right peg empty
Goal configuration: left peg top-to-bottom E F G H I J, middle peg top-to-bottom D, right peg top-to-bottom A B C
Standard Tower of Hanoi rules apply: only one disk moved at a time, a larger disk may never be placed on top of a smaller disk

generate_moves.system_prompt: You are an expert at producing ordered primitive moves for cooperative Tower of Hanoi execution. Produce an ordered list of primitive moves that agent_1 can perform given its disk authority and the public initial and goal states. Do not produce PDDL. Each move must follow the format 'agent_1: move disk X from peg1 to peg2' and must respect Tower of Hanoi rules and the restriction that agent_1 may only move disks A B C D.
generate_moves.prompt: Your name is agent_1. Public information: {environment->public_information}. Your private information: {agents->agent_1->private_information}. Your local goal: {agents->agent_1->goal}. Provide an ordered list of primitive moves you can perform that are consistent with the public information and your private restrictions. If you cannot determine some moves because of missing information from other agents, provide all moves that you can unambiguously perform given your knowledge.

generate_moves.system_prompt: You are an expert at producing ordered primitive moves for cooperative Tower of Hanoi execution. Produce an ordered list of primitive moves that agent_2 can perform given its disk authority and the public initial and goal states. Do not produce PDDL. Each move must follow the format 'agent_2: move disk X from peg1 to peg2' and must respect Tower of Hanoi rules and the restriction that agent_2 may only move disks E F G.
generate_moves.prompt: Your name is agent_2. Public information: {environment->public_information}. Your private information: {agents->agent_2->private_information}. Your local goal: {agents->agent_2->goal}. Provide an ordered list of primitive moves you can perform that are consistent with the public information and your private restrictions. If you cannot determine some moves because of missing information from other agents, provide all moves that you can unambiguously perform given your knowledge.

generate_moves.system_prompt: You are an expert at producing ordered primitive moves for cooperative Tower of Hanoi execution. Produce an ordered list of primitive moves that agent_3 can perform given its disk authority and the public initial and goal states. Do not produce PDDL. Each move must follow the format 'agent_3: move disk X from peg1 to peg2' and must respect Tower of Hanoi rules and the restriction that agent_3 may only move disks H I J.
generate_moves.prompt: Your name is agent_3. Public information: {environment->public_information}. Your private information: {agents->agent_3->private_information}. Your local goal: {agents->agent_3->goal}. Provide an ordered list of primitive moves you can perform that are consistent with the public information and your private restrictions. If you cannot determine some moves because of missing information from other agents, provide all moves that you can unambiguously perform given your knowledge.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert in multi-agent planning and PDDL authoring targeted to the FastDownwards planner. Integrate the agents' ordered primitive move lists and produce a single PDDL domain and a single PDDL problem that represent the cooperative plan. Keep each agent's actions distinct in the domain and problem and ensure the resulting PDDL is compatible with FastDownwards. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags.
pddl.prompt: You are the orchestrator. You will receive the primitive move lists from three agents: {workflow->agent_1->generate_moves->output}, {workflow->agent_2->generate_moves->output}, {workflow->agent_3->generate_moves->output}. The global goal to achieve is: {agents->orchestrator->goal}. Integrate the provided move lists, resolve any naming or ordering ambiguities, and produce a PDDL domain and problem designed for FastDownwards that encode the cooperative plan. Keep actions of agent_1, agent_2, and agent_3 distinct and ensure the domain enforces Tower of Hanoi constraints and the per-agent disk move restrictions. Enclose the domain with <domain></domain> and the problem with <problem></problem>.
